title: M5-Circle of Trust
description: Would you trust a bunch of strangers with your life?“I was hooked from the first page, and so excited to dive back into this interesting, complex world! I am obsessed with this series. It's like nothing I've ever read before, a genre all its own.” Alissa TrippWhen King Korah launches a brutal crackdown, tensions run high, and loyalties are put to the test. Members of The Resistance realize they are putting their lives on the line for a Prince they do not know.Posed to retake the Alanthian throne, Josiah must rely on the team assembled under his cousin, Peter, which leaves everyone wondering, who will be accepted into the Circle of Trust?Will the revolutionaries pull together to defeat Korah, or will old rivalries and hidden secrets tear them apart?Ambitious, entertaining, enlightening, and sexy, all the pieces and players come together as the genre bending Millennium Series continues with M5-Circle of Trust.Find out who will be found worthy. Pick up your copy today!
author: Staci Morrison
